resources.string: Press the physical Wakeable button to turn off your alarm.
Looks like we\'re having some trouble connecting. Try moving closer to the device and re-starting the wakeable app.
Head\'s up: you\'re not connected to Wakeable, but you just turned on your alarm.
Got it, I will try to reconnect first.
Set my alarm anyway, I\'ll connect to my device later.
Oh dear, it looks like wakeable had a problem connecting. Try moving closer to the device and confirming that the bluetooth on your phone is on.
Android requires usage of location data to scan for bluetooth devices. Please accept the following prompt in order for Wakeable to find your device.
Wakeable stores app logs so the team can help you if you run into any issues. Please accept the following prompt to help us help you!
You are disconnected from your Wakeable.\n Press the button to stop your alarm.
sync this app with your Wakeable; click below
plug in the Wakeable to a power source

string-array.name: wakeup_texts
string-array.item: You got this!\n Seriously, you really do.
It\'s a lovely day!\n It\'s full of opportunity.
